item.description:
Sue had the fantastic idea to choose this place last time but for whatever reason a few of you weren't with the group.

You're invited to join us for another happy hour at Coogan's in the Fanueil Hall area to imbibe your favorite social lubricant.

I will arrive at 5 and hang until about 9 but I know some of you will probably close the place down. You know who you are.

Free food will be available from 5 until 7

Trivia contest begins at 7...We need to redeem ourselves so please come out and share your wealth of useless trivia

Coogan's Link

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: I should be the only one wearing a tiara. Also look for the Happy Hour Meetup sign.
item.why: Meet people who enjoy the pleasures of a good drink in a fun place
item.name: So Nice We Have To Do It Twice
